title: What to know about Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson, Biden's Supreme Court pick
description: President Biden will name D.C. Circuit Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court. She was recently confirmed with bipartisan support.
content: WASHINGTON – President Joe Biden on Friday nominated Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court to replace Associate Justice Stephen Breyer, a historic nomination that now heads to the Senate f… [+2392 chars]
